( Mahavira had it\ntoo \u2013but NOT Buddha ) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The endless knot of Sri\nVatsa is found on Vishnu\u2019s right side chest. &nbsp;This symbol represents the interweaving of\nchange with time. &nbsp;&nbsp;Srivatsa is one of\nthe 1008 names of Lord Vishnu in the Vishnu Sahasranam. &nbsp;The Kaustubh Mani was a powerful deep blue\ndiamond with a radiance equal to the sun.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;It was obtained during the\nchurning of the sea ( Samudra Manthan ) .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Vishnu wears\nKaustubh Mani in a garland on his chest. This tone brings invincibility on to\nits wearer .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Srivatsa mark on\nLord Vishnu\u2019s right chest is due to this diamond, which caused a design of fine\nyellow hair in an endless knot geometrical form\u2014as per Sree Bhagawatham (SB\n10.13.48)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SAHAR VAKSH STHAL\nKAUSTUBHASHRIYAM, NAMAMI VISHNUM SIRASA CHATURBHUJAM ||<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This hymn talks about\nthe Kaustubha diamond on Vishnu. . Both Srivatsa and Kaustubha are generally\nlisted together in the same line, often in the same word even, in the verses of\nthe Bhagavatam.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shiva is incomplete\nwithout Brahma and Vishnu\u2014as they are force field which work in tandem and in\nharmony..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shiva is an energy\nfield which has been personalised.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No MORONIC Veerashaiva Lingayat\ncan just say -- i do NOT believe in the other fields which balance and sustain\nit. By doing so, he also hoped to evade an\nassembly of Munis who remained on the banks of the lake awaiting his return.\nDatta emerged from the water naked in the company of a beautiful woman. The\ntext relates that he made love with her (maithuna), drank liquor, and enjoyed\nsinging and music. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The origin of Bhairava\ncan be traced to the conversation between Lord Brahma and Lord Vishnu recounted\nin \"Shiv Maha-Puran\" where Lord Vishnu asks Lord Brahma who is the\nsupreme creator of the Universe. Arrogantly, Brahma tells Vishnu to worship him\nbecause he (Brahma) is the supreme creator. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This angered Shiva who\nthen incarnated in the form of Bhairava to punish Brahma. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Below: Dont make Bhairava angry , OK ?</i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-vBikwT6hels/VBx2ZD7IjbI/AAAAAAAAwGU/wXGs2MWY4Dw/s1600/bhairavvdea-QI20_l.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-vBikwT6hels/VBx2ZD7IjbI/AAAAAAAAwGU/wXGs2MWY4Dw/s1600/bhairavvdea-QI20_l.jpg\" width=\"290\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bhairava beheaded one\nof Brahma's five heads and since then Brahma has only four heads. TEE HEEEE !\nmost of the poison was injected into sanskrit purana scripts itself --\ndirectly, and the originals destroyed .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hundreds of Kashmiri\nbrahmins who knew Sanskrit were kidnapped and taken to England.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They were told to\ninject poison --how Shiva and Vishnu were having GAY SEX etc .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This would be told to 3\npandits who cannot see each other in widely different parts of the country.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the pandits wanted\nto be patriots and tried to resist poison injection hoping that the white man\ncannot understand sanskrit , they would be caught and tortured.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- and then going back\nto India to get cremated after you die was impossible.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Dattatreya , the\navatar of Shiva , emerged from the water naked in the company of a beautiful\nwoman. &nbsp;&nbsp;The text relates that he made\nlove with her (maithuna), drank liquor, and enjoyed singing and music \"&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ONLY DOUBT WE MUST HAVE\nIS IF HE USED RIBBED CONDOM --AND IF SO WHAT COLOUR AND FLAVOUR.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So,&nbsp; we have people in India blindly believing\nthat \" Brahma, Vishnu and Siva, were asked by their wives to eat food\nserved by dattatreya's NUDE mother \"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Oh yes, everybody\nincluding hindus and muslims want to make Dattatreya an avatar of Shiva and\nVishnu. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some want to make him\nan Aghori.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maharishi Dattatreya is\nson of Maharishi Atri ( one of the seven rishis ) , and hence his name Atreya .\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Datta means blessed by\ntrinity to sage couple Atri and Anasuya. He has two brothers, Soma and\nDurvasas. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are a few\nreferences to him in the famous Hindu epic the Mahabharata.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The original Maharishi Dattatreya\nis a DISCIPLE ( not avatar ) of Lord Shiva. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Parashurama was a\ndisciple of Maharishi Dattatreya. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The\nTripura-rahasya refers to the disciple Parasurama finding Dattatreya meditating\non Gandhamadana mountain. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aghor tradition\nbelieves that Jagadguru Dattatreya propounded the tradition of Aghor.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Below: So many avatars-- an avatar for every aghor occasion !</i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-19Z09xorRQg/VBx12W8fJ0I/AAAAAAAAwGM/-lTybuI-Wgg/s1600/Scan10036ssw.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are several Muslim Sufis who are\nrevered by their Hindu followers as forms or incarnations of Dattatreya.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; . &nbsp;&nbsp;To make him authentic he was awarded the\nprize for&nbsp; bringing coffee to India.&nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; The Ayurvedic physicians used their olfactory senses, while\npreparing medicines- and coffee beans was used to reset the sense of smell.</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Linga Purana\nwherein the immoral white invader injected poison \u2013Lord Shiva&nbsp; seduces the wives of the Maharishis in the\nDeodar Forest who come to give him alms .&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bhikshatana ( Lord\nShiva naked with an erect phallus &nbsp;)\nroams around with a human skull as a begging bowl, and the Maharishis are very\nupset and have a confrontation with him.&nbsp;\nWhy not? Their wives were sexually excited at the mere sight of him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Getting back -<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The outraged sages watching\ntheir wives running after naked Shiva with his phallus dripping semen , curse\nhis Linga to fall off and it becomes the infinite pillar\u2014 this is the extent\nthe immoral white invedr has attacked Hindusim<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The R stooge EVR\nPeriyar followers converted Bhikshatana into a popular icon.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white invader cast\nthe naked Shiva in bronze, and it can be seen with the dong hanging in almost\nevery major Tamil Shiva temple. Such statues NEVER EVER existed before the white\ninvader came to India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-1ArA6hphKu0/VBxnOMlVdhI/AAAAAAAAwFI/g57y0DfUJ70/s1600/Vridachaleswarar_Bsswhikshatana.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"384\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-1ArA6hphKu0/VBxnOMlVdhI/AAAAAAAAwFI/g57y0DfUJ70/s1600/Vridachaleswarar_Bsswhikshatana.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why do Hindus tolerate\nthese filthy cooked up lies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tripura Sundari Temple\nis&nbsp; about 50 km from Agartala . During\nthe time of the white invader ( never before ) the stooge priest conducted\nanimal scarifices ( like at the Kamakhya temple in Guwahati ) which is NOT\nsanctioned by Sanatana Dharma ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Goats were brought with garlands round their\nnecks, as offerings.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Below: Animal sacrifice introduced in Hindu temple Tripura Sundari, by the immoral white invader </span></i>.<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-IxdLK3049G8/VBxqAOgVM7I/AAAAAAAAwFk/M-cpPIUXpp8/s1600/downerrload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-IxdLK3049G8/VBxqAOgVM7I/AAAAAAAAwFk/M-cpPIUXpp8/s1600/downerrload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A notice board there\nstill showsthe the charges for goat and buffalo sacrifices. The Kalika Purana\nis a poison injected Purana , created by the immoral white invader.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thi kalika purana was\nmade out to be a manual on how to do HUMAN SACRIFICE , ritual intercourse\nbefore the devi idols, use of beef and drugs before a Tantra ritual etc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana dharma did NOT\nhave even animal sacrifice, leave alone human sacrifice.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Using this fake purana\nthousands of self loathing Hindu Indians have been converted to Christianity.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Below: Sai Baba's &nbsp;\"TURIN SHROUD \" type miracle &nbsp;!! &nbsp;Then he must be god, right?</i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-OfApAPmKs4s/VBxrbM7K-II/AAAAAAAAwF0/jiFCfwc_cZ0/s1600/muid6o669.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"268\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-OfApAPmKs4s/VBxrbM7K-II/AAAAAAAAwF0/jiFCfwc_cZ0/s1600/muid6o669.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">A modus operandi to denigrate\nHinduism, is by putting a post on Hinduism in a national newspaper , and then allowing VULGAR DEMEANING\ncomments made by readers to stand. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">I\nwould never allow that on my blogsite-</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">as\nI retain some sense censorship of my comments post\u2014even though I may be busy.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">These are the FAKE stories which is touted by people like Zakir Naik.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An example?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today we have many\nIndian writers who are highly sponsored and awarded by Zionist media and white Christian\nevangelists.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me quote , what one\nsuch feted Indian writer Devadutt Pattanaik (</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;the former chief\nbelief officer -- BOY OH BOY ! -- &nbsp;of Future Group, one of India's largest retailers,) &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">has written about Nandi the bull. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He injects poison and allows his readers to\nput poisonous comments .</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He will NOT\ndelete them , he has approved all of them.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-19fXcNh6v38/VBy9r7e1y4I/AAAAAAAAwHI/3-SyjQ9dm0g/s1600/dokikugwnlu5oad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"239\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-19fXcNh6v38/VBy9r7e1y4I/AAAAAAAAwHI/3-SyjQ9dm0g/s1600/dokikugwnlu5oad.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>ARTICLE -- Published in\nDevlok,&nbsp; Sunday Midday,&nbsp; August 08, 2010</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><i><b>He writes brimming with sarcasm , and the white man loves him &nbsp;-&nbsp;</b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">I recently visited a\nbrand new modern Shiva temple complete with a neon sign post and a billboard.\nThe patron of the temple wanted me to see the USP of his temple: a gigantic\nNandi bull placed in the courtyard facing the main shrine.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Nandi is the mount of\nthe hermit-god.&nbsp; The statue made of\nconcrete was an impressive one.&nbsp; As I\nwalked around it, I asked the patron, \u201cIs this a bull or an ox?\u201d &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\u201cIt is Nandi,\u201d he\nreplied.&nbsp; So I clarified myself, \u201cIs\nNandi a bull or an ox?\u201d&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">This baffled the\npatron.&nbsp; It dawned on me he did not know\nthe difference between a bull and an ox. &nbsp;&nbsp;A true blue city-slicker, with no\nunderstanding of animal husbandry practices, he was!<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">I had asked the\nquestion as I noticed that the scrotum (the bag of skin containing testicles)\nof the gigantic Nandi bull could not be seen at the back.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">In any traditional Shiva temple, one is often\nshocked by the importance placed to Nandi\u2019s scrotum.&nbsp; It hangs down prominently and some devotees,\nincluding the priest, make it a point to touch it before entering the shrine of\nShiva. <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Modern images of Nandi,\nmade using concrete and marble and plastic and plaster of Paris, shy away from\ndoing so.&nbsp; \u201cBecause,\u201d explained one\ncraftsman who I interrogated, \u201cpeople feel embarrassed by it.&nbsp; They find it very vulgar.&nbsp; So we don\u2019t show it anymore.&nbsp; Some even assume Nandi is a cow!\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">We are becoming an\nincreasingly prudish people.&nbsp; Prudishness\nlaced with ignorance is a dangerous combination.&nbsp; Showing the scrotum of Nandi is critical.&nbsp; The point is not to titillate.&nbsp; The point is to inform all devotees that\nNandi is male (not a cow) and that he is not castrated (not an ox or steer or\nbullock).&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">This means he is not\ndomesticated.&nbsp; Nandi cannot be used to\npull ploughs or carts.&nbsp; He is no beast of\nburden.&nbsp; To show Nandi without his\nscrotum is to take away his identity.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">When I explained this\nto the temple patron, he came up with an ingenious answer to save face,\n\u201cActually the scrotum is there, hidden under his body.\u201d&nbsp; I smiled as no one can make a bull of\nconcrete stand up.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">In mythology, Shiva\nrefuses to get married and be a householder.&nbsp;\nIn other words, he refuses to get domesticated.&nbsp; But the Goddess appeals to him to marry her.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Unless Shiva\nparticipates in worldly affairs, unless he serves her as a husband, children\ncannot be conceived and the world cannot be created.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Shiva reluctantly\nagrees.&nbsp; He becomes the groom of the\nGoddess, but he is never the head of her household.&nbsp; He lives with her but is not the bread\nwinner.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">He fathers children,\nbut is not father to the children.&nbsp;\nShakti becomes the autonomous matriarch.&nbsp;\nShe becomes the cow, nourishing the world with her milk.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">He remains independent\nin spirit, refusing to be fettered by the ways of the world.&nbsp; This aspect of Shiva is what Nandi portrays\nas he sits benignly at his master\u2019s doorstep.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">SOURCE </b>:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <span style=\"color: blue;\">http://devdutt.com/articles/indian-mythology/its-all-bull.html</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: magenta;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Below : Devdutt\nPattanaik --check out his&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">laissez faire approach&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">when dealing with Hindus spirituality --</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Kn17yuamiEw/VBy9_UZ-wQI/AAAAAAAAwHQ/awV7d1qGf_o/s1600/downli7titondnjgtkad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"294\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Kn17yuamiEw/VBy9_UZ-wQI/AAAAAAAAwHQ/awV7d1qGf_o/s1600/downli7titondnjgtkad.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: red;\">COMMENT<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: red;\">mk \u2022 3 years ago \u2013 (\nCOMMENT APPROVED AND PUBLISHED BY Devdutt Pattanaik in Midday newspaper )<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: red;\">Let me share an\ninteresting and amusing anecdote as why nandi sits in front of Shiva\u015b lingam\nand why we all touch his scrotum... .In the jungles of Ratnagiri, a folktale\ntalks of lore long forgotten, there is tribe that sings the lore every Shivrathri.&nbsp; it lore goes as below...<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: red;\">Shiva after getting\nmarried to Parvati was enjoying his blissful wedded life.&nbsp; Parvathi after some time felt longing to\nvisit her parents place and decided to go. after many years still she did not\nreturn.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: red;\">Shiva it seems was very\nlonely and could not continue to control his urge of sex.&nbsp; Lo as his phallus became stiffer, he decided\nto use Nandis help.&nbsp; </span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">Nandi allowed Shiva to\nravage his body on a condition that he would do once Shiva has finished his\nurge.&nbsp;( </span><span style=\"color: blue;\">PERVERTED BESTIALITY AT ITS BEST</span><span style=\"color: red;\"> )</span></b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: red;\">Once Shiva was over\nwith his appetite, he ran away from nandi and sat in a small room turned\nhimself into a phallus thus avoiding nandi.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: red;\">Nandi could not enter the\nsmall room sat outside waiting for Shiva and thus has been seating ever since.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: red;\">Since then, all\ndevotees of Shiva touch Nandi\u015b scrotum before we worship Shiva as a reminder to\nNandi of Shiva\u2019s &nbsp;promise.. so goes the\ntale.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: red;\">I have heard this story\nmyself among the tribals of western ghats when trekking near these remote\nplaces.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: red;\">So whether you guys rebuke me or not the\nstory made every sense for me as to why touch Nandi\u015b balls everytime.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7o_EG1hQsSk/VBy-1z3nu4I/AAAAAAAAwHc/TQMLfsVULw8/s1600/WhyAnimalworsErWGHhipinhinduism7.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHO IS NANDI ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before worshipping Lord\nShiva , devotees first seek the blessings of first devotee Nandi .&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nandi is so devoted to Shiva that his every\nthought is directed to Him.&nbsp; Nandi is always\nrepresented as quiet and benign.&nbsp; Nandi\nis also considered to be the guardian of four-legged animals.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shiva is a force field\nwho is depicted as a person in Hindu mythology.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Shiva form cannot\nbe complete without his vehicle, Nandi, the bull. ..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Mahakala is NOT a\ngatekeeper , along with Nandi as said by many.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nMahakala is Shiva himself as Lord of Space / Time . &nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Hindu mythology, Nandi&nbsp; is the guru of eighteen masters (18 siddhas)\nwhich also includes Maharishi Patanjali who wrote the Yoga Sutras. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In\nHindu mythology, Nandi is the bearer of faith, controlled strength / virility\nand protector of Dharma ( truth / righteousness.)<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Below: 8000 year old Harappa seal&nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ETNQ402LMwE/VBzA4ocYeRI/AAAAAAAAwII/H7a2HiyuwbM/s1600/terracotta-tarrble-decoration-item-harappa-image-SP86_l.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Spiritually, Nandi\nrepresents an individual jiva (soul) and the message that the jiva should\nalways be focussed on the Atman (Paramatman).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every religion on this\nplanet has lifted from Nandi\u2014without the deep understanding of cosmic creation.\nStone carvings and seals of Nandi bull were unearthed at Indus valley and\nHarappa.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nandi, the white sacred\nbull with a black tail is the vahana ( Vimana ) of Lord Shiva.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Our perception of how the universe functions is imperfect.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All our\nknowledge is the offspring of our perceptions.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Attitude can effect\nperception of the real world and the real world can effect attitude. Perception\nis hence more like a reflection of reality than reality itself.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Truth can exist\nonly , only in the present, in this instant, in the here and now. The past and\nthe future are both illusions, and like all illusions, they are devoid of\nTruth.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Distinguish truth and\nreality. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Truth is is real.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reality is not known, it\nis realised, experienced.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"background-attachment: initial; background-clip: initial; background-image: initial; background-origin: initial; background-position: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-size: initial;\">Much of human perception is not based on information flowing into the\nbrain from the outside world , rather on\nwhat the brain expects to happen next.-- <i>Kuch aaya oopra ka thalle mein ?</i></span></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There has to be a base\nfor every thing.&nbsp;&nbsp; Relativity is the only\nthing which allows anything to exist. &nbsp;There\nhas to be a reference point for a phobia .&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Are all afraid &nbsp;of snakes? &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Are all afraid of\nshadows ? &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People who do NOT\nunderstand this truth usually paint themselves into a corner.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You cant think in black\nand white. Everything cannot be termed in groups of right and wrong. There are\nshades of grey.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When dealing with the\nlaw you must pinch and remind yourself, that absolutes could rule the day. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Do you plead guilty\nor non-guilty\", asked the judge.&nbsp;\nYou will piss him off if you say \" I am only a little guilty!\"\n&nbsp;Like the 12 year old girl telling her\nmother \" Ma, looks like I am a little pregnant!\" <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Perception determines\nhow a person responds to the world.&nbsp; This\nmeans there is no reality- only perception. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is why people all\nover the world get fooled by clever advertisements and branding.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, the more you\nalready know about a topic, the harder it is for anyone to mislead or misinform\nyou.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You get upset with\npeople as they do NOT conform to your personal rules for the situation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Perception determines\nreality but at the same time your \"perception\" of reality does not\nmean that it is indeed reality... it is just your reality. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our memories are not\nthe equivalent of video recordings of events. Instead, memories are our\ninterpretative summaries of the information gathered by your senses. Your\nbeliefs, values and references are what make your reality.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You may see a situation\nas being bad while a person who is more optimistic sees it as an opportunity\nfor growth. &nbsp;Business is all about\nperceptions.&nbsp; The essence of leading,\nmanaging, marketing and selling is coming to grips with people's perceptions. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">MILLIONS OF HINDUS WERE\nMADE SELF LOATHING BY THE STORY OF SHIVA\u2019S PRICK DRIPPING SEMEN ALL AROUND THE\nPLACE , RIGHT?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">We had INDOPHILE white\nmen and women ( like Wendy Doniger ) interpreting Hindusim for us , right?\u2014all\nwolves in sheep\u2019s clothing !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">FOUR DECADES AGO DURING A SHIPBOARD PARTY ON AUGUST 15TH NIGHT, I DECLARED THAT INDIA WILL BE THIS PLANET'S NO 1 SUPERPOWER ( AGAIN ) IN 50 YEARS &nbsp;. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">( <i>the entire lounge went into peals of laughter . &nbsp;Someone asked me who will be No 2 and 3. &nbsp; I said China and Brazil. &nbsp;Then all erupted into another higher decibel of laughter. &nbsp;I was nick named MR INDIA</i>.)</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THEY KNOW IT TOO . &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WATCH HOW THE GORAS WOO NARENDRA MODI IN THE NEXT 3 DAYS &nbsp;.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1355131828973993083\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_84M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/08173368436479307173\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Anurag Shukla</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_8.html?showComment=1515577636725#c1355131828973993083\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 10, 2018 at 3:17 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_84MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nFollow your inner voice. When reading bhaja govindam previously, even I did not fee comfortable with the first verse saying \"\u0938\u092e\u094d\u092a\u094d\u0930\u093e\u092a\u094d\u0924\u0947 \u0938\u0928\u094d\u0928\u093f\u0939\u093f\u0924\u0947 \u0915\u093e\u0932\u0947<br />\n\u0928\u0939\u093f \u0928\u0939\u093f \u0930\u0915\u094d\u0937\u0924\u093f \u0921\u0941\u0915\u0943\u0919\u094d\u0915\u0930\u0923\u0947\". Then again the part where a saffron clad Adi Sankara says<br />\n\u091c\u091f\u093f\u0932\u094b \u092e\u0941\u0923\u094d\u0921\u0940 \u0932\u0941\u091e\u094d\u091b\u093f\u0924\u0915\u0947\u0936\u0903<br />\n\u0915\u093e\u0937\u093e\u092f\u093e\u092e\u094d\u092c\u0930\u092c\u0939\u0941\u0915\u0943\u0924\u0935\u0947\u0937\u0903 \u0964<br />\n\u092a\u0936\u094d\u092f\u0928\u094d\u0928\u092a\u093f \u091a \u0928 \u092a\u0936\u094d\u092f\u0924\u093f \u092e\u0942\u0922\u094b<br />\n\u0939\u094d\u092f\u0941\u0926\u0930\u0928\u093f\u092e\u093f\u0924\u094d\u0924\u0902 \u092c\u0939\u0941\u0915\u0943\u0924\u0935\u0947\u0937\u0903 \u0965 \u0967\u096a\u0965<br />\n<br />\nThere are many who go with matted locks, many who have clean<br />\nshaven heads, many whose hairs have been plucked out; some are<br />\nclothed in orange, yet others in various colours --- all just for<br />\na livelihood.<br />\n<br />\nHow can a saint himself deride saints like this? Even if there are black sheep, will he write a verse deriding all sadhus?<br />\n<br />\nAgain in Hanuman Chalisa - even when reading it aloud, I could not get myself to say these lines -<br />\n<br />\n\u0914\u0930 \u0926\u0947\u0935\u0924\u093e \u091a\u093f\u0924\u094d\u0924 \u0928 \u0927\u0930\u0908 \u0964<br />\n\u0939\u0928\u0941\u092e\u0924 \u0938\u0947\u0907 \u0938\u0930\u094d\u092c \u0938\u0941\u0916 \u0915\u0930\u0908 \u0965\u0969\u096b\u0965<br />\n<br />\nI will not keep any other God in my heart, except Hanuman.<br />\nSo I will not even remember Ram/Vishnu (even though Hanuman himself worships Ram)?<br />\n<br />\nThis never felt right.<br />\n<br />\nAs soon as Ajit ji wrote this, it was a Eureka moment.<br />\n<br />\nMany thanks, Ajit ji.</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_84MN\" kind=\"m\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_84BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; BALLS --RIDICULOUS</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">jo shata b\u0101ra p\u0101tha kara ko\u012b\u0964 chh\u016btahi bandi mah\u0101 sukha ho\u012b\u0965 38 \u0965</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">One who recites Hanuman Chalisa a hundred times (or for hundred days) is released from bondage ( MOKSHA ) and obtains great bliss\". BALLS !</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">jo yaha parhai hanum\u0101na ch\u0101l\u012bs\u0101\u0964 hoya siddha s\u0101kh\u012b gaur\u012bs\u0101\u0965 39 \u0965</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">One who reads this Hanuman Chalisa obtains Siddhi (accomplishment or liberation). A hole is made in the roof of the Mandapa where the line of the above angle touches the roof.<br />\n<br />\nThe middle point between the eyebrows of the idol, the hole in the roof and the top of the Dhwaja is in the same line.<br />\n<br />\nThe above angle line when extended should reach the top of the Kalasa the Gali-Gopuram. The Gali-Gopuram should be constructed at thr right distance.<br />\n<br />\nAs the earth axis is tilted to an angle of 23.4 degrees the small hole, the top of the Dhwaja and the top of the Gali-Gopuram should be in a line making an angle of 23.4 degrees with the normal sight line of the idol for the optimum powerful radiation of the directional power.<br />\n<br />\nA TEMPLE STUMBHA IS A QUARTER LAMBDA ANTENNA --NOT FOR ELECTROMAGNETIC WAVES BUT FOR SCALAR WAVES --HOWEVER IT FULLFILLS CONDITIONS FOR ELECTROMAGNETIC SPECTRUM.<br />\n<br />\nEVERY STAMBHA IN ANCIENT TIMES HAS IRRIDIUM AND RHODIUM INHERENT IN THE VAHANA FIGURE OF THE DEITY RIGHT ON TOP. VAHANA MEANS CARRIER ( WAVE ).<br />\n<br />\nToday any incoming missile is shot down in seconds using circular arrays are composed of thousands of crossed dipole antennas.<br />\n<br />\nThe impedance of a 1/4 lambda Marconi antenna is 36.6 ohms.A \u00bd lambda dipole has an impedance of about 70 ohms . They are indeed the same, just as musk and its scent are inseparable, or as fire and its heat are nondifferent. Thus Radha and Lord Krsna are one, yet They have taken two forms to enjoy the mellows of pastimes. (Cc. Adi 4.96-98)<br />\n<br />\nisvarera sakti haya e-tina prakara<br />\neka laksmi-gana, pure mahisi-gana ara<br />\nvraje gopi-gana ara sabhate pradhana<br />\nvrajendra-nandana ya'te svayam bhagavan<br />\n<br />\nThe energies (consorts) of the Supreme Lord are of three kinds: the Laksmis in Vaikuntha, the queens in Dvaraka, and the gopis in Vrndavana. The gopis are the best of all, for they have the privilege of serving Sri Krsna, the primeval Lord, the son of the King of Vraja (Cc. Adi 1.79,80)<br />\n<br />\nSORRY -- All this bull about Radha being a mistress of Lord Krishna and all his thousands of Gopikas whom he flirted with , are all poisons injected into Hinduism by the white Christian invader. SORRY, SHIVA IS A COMIC ALLEGORY<br />\n<br />\nNOW HE GIVES HAJJAR BULL ABOUT HEAVEN, HELL AND CHITRAGUPTA..<br />\n<br />\nSORRY --THERE IS NO HEAVEN AND HELL IN HINDUISM.. WE NEVER HEARD OF CHITRAGUPTA ( AND MISSING LINK KAYASTHAS ) TILL THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nIN SANATANA DHARMA HEAVEN IS THE SEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER ( BRAHMAN THE FIELD ) WHO SHEARED OFF A SMALL BIT OF HIS BODY AND SEND YOU AS A SOUL ( BALL OF ENERGY ) AT ITS LOWEST FREQUENCY TO GAIN LIFE EXPERIENCE..<br />\n<br />\nYOU ( YOUR SOUL EVOLVED ) FROM BACTERIA, TO BIRD, TO ANIMAL TO HUMAN WITH LOW FREQUENCY SOULD TO MOKSHA SOUL OF HIGHEST FREQUENCY , SAME AS BRAHMAN --AFTER WHICH YOUR SOUL MERGED BACK WITH MOTHER FIELD OF BRAHMAN TO SHARE LIFE EXPERIENCES WITH ITS MOTHER ..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN THE FEED BACK STOPS IN THIS CLOSED LOOP --PRALAYA ( DISSOLUTION ) HAPPENS ..<br />\n<br />\nFIRST ASTRAL LATER IS MEANT FOR ALL SPECIES OF LIVES --EXCEPT HUMAN .. THE SOULS OF CRIMINALS/ HOMOSEXUALS WHO HAVE NO CONSCIENCE ARE IN THE LAYER..<br />\n<br />\nSECOND TO SIXTH LAYERS ARE MEANT ONLY FOR CONSCIOUS HUMANS..<br />\n<br />\nTHE SECOND ASTRAL LAYER MEANT FOR SOULS WITH LOWEST FREQUENCY ( HIGH NEGATIVE KARMIC BAGGAGE ) AND THE SIXTH ASTRAL HAVING PARKING SPACE FOR SOULS OF HIGHER FREQUENCY ( LOW NEGATIVE KARMIC BAGGAGE ).<br />\n<br />\nYAMA IS IN CHARGE OF LAYERS TWO TO SIX..<br />\n<br />\nALL SOULS IN FIRST TO SIXTH ASTRAL LAYERS --AWAIT RE-BIRTH.<br />\n<br />\nSEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER IS THE FIELD OF BRAHMAN ( VAIKUNTA ).. HERE ONLY MOKSHA SOULS -- NIL EGO, NIL KRAMIC BAGGAGE AND HIGHEST SOULD FREQUENCY ( SAME AS MOTHER FIELD BRAHMAN ) CAN ENTER --TO BE MERGED WITH BRAHMAN ( GOD )..<br />\n<br />\nONLY SOULS CAN ENTER ALL SEVEN ASTRAL LAYERS --NOT THE PHYSICAL BODY ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE RASCAL SADUGU JAGGI VASUDEV LIES ABOUT PLENTY FOOD TO EAT AND APSARAS FOR SEX IN SEVENTH LAYER .. BALLS !<br />\n<br />\nWHEN THE 5 PANDAVA BROTHERS AND DRAUPADI DECIDE TO CLIMB MOUNT MERU --IT IS AN ALLEGORY FOR DEATH AND SOULS PARKING AT ONE OF THE SEVEN ASTRAL LAYERS<br />\n<br />\nYAMA ( DHARMA ) IN THE FORM OF A DOG JOINS THIS GROUP ..<br />\n<br />\nYAMA USHERS IN --<br />\nDRAUPADI INTO THE SECOND ASTRAL LAYER<br />\nNAKULA INTO THE THIRD ASTRAL LAYER<br />\nSAHADEVA INTO THE FOURTH ASTRAL LAYER<br />\nBHIMA INTO THE FIFTH ASTRAL LAYER<br />\nARJUNA INTO THE SIXTH ASTRAL LAYER<br />\n<br />\nAND THEN YUDHISTRA LOOKS BACK AND SEES THE DOG.. HE KNOWS THAT NO DOG CAN GET PAST THE FIRST ASTRAL LAYER --AND HE IS PUZZLED..<br />\n<br />\nAT THE SEVENT ASTRAL LAYER ( EQUIVALENT OF HEAVEN ) YUDDHISTRA SEES ALL HUNDRED KAURAVAS ALREADY THERE -- ALONG WITH THE STALWARTS LIKE BHISHMA/ DRONA /KARNA ETC<br />\n<br />\nHE IS SHOCKED AND ANGRY<br />\n<br />\nAT THAT TIME YAMA ( THE DOORKEEPER OF ASTRAL LAYERS 2 TO 6 ) DECLARES THAT HE IS YUDDHISTRAs FATHER WITH KUNTI .. AND THAT YUDDHISTRA STILL HAS SEEDS OF EGO WITHIN HIMS WHICH MAKES HIM UNFIT FOR MOKSHA ..<br />\n<br />\nYAMAs EXPLANATION: WHOEVER KRISHNA KILLED --ALL GOT MOKSHA .. KRISHNA HAD THE UNWRITTEN TASK OF KILLING ALL 100 TEST TUBE KAURAVA BABIES-- HE DID IT AND HOW..<br />\n<br />\nPANDAVAS WOULD HAVE HAD ALBINO BLOOD OF MOTHER KUNTI HAS SEX WITH PANDU ( AN ALBINO )--AND IN THAT CASE KRISHNA WOULD HAVE KILLED ALL 5 PANDAVAS TOO..<br />\n<br />\nBeautiful and intelligent Queen Kunti was the mother of Karna and the first three Pandava brothers Yudhishthira, Bhima, Arjuna. .<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_179BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; Mark 1:10; Luke 3:22; John 1:32). Luke says, \u201cAnd the Holy Spirit came down in a bodily shape, like a dove on Him.\u201d Because the Holy Spirit is just that\u2014spirit\u2014He is not visible to us. On this occasion, however, the Spirit took on a visible appearance and was doubtless seen by the people. The dove is an emblem of purity and harmlessness (Matthew 10:16), and the form of the dove at Jesus\u2019 baptism signified that the Spirit with which Jesus was endowed was one of holiness and innocence\u2026BLAH BLAH \u2026.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 37.3333px;\">SAME WAY JEW ROTHSCHILD COOKED UP THE BIRD NONSENSE FOR AMARTNATH CAVE..IN THIS CASE PIGEON EGG .. NOW, DEVI ( WIFE OF SHIVA ) IS ENERGY.. SHE IS NOT A MORTAL WOMAN..<br />\n<br />\nTHE SPOT ADI SHANKARACHARYA LOOKED BACK, DEVI DISAPPEARED AND HE CONSECRATED THE POWERFUL MOOKAMBIKA TEMPLE THERE ..<br />\n<br />\nTHOUGH THE TEMPLE IS IN KOLOOR KARNATAKA, ONLY MALAYALIS DEVOTEES GO THERE ..WE KNOW WHAT IT IS..<br />\n<br />\nTHERE ARE UNDERGROUND WATER CHANNELS FROM THE TOP OF KUDAJADRI MOUNTAIN TO THE INNER SANCTUM OF MOOKAMBIKA TEMPLE..<br />\n<br />\nDURING THESE RECENT FLOODS THE TEMPLE WAS PARTIALLY SUBERGED..<br />\n<br />\nSAME IN GIZA PYRAMIDS.. I HAD WRITTEN ABOUT THE APEX OF THE PYRAMID EMITTING A BLUE PLASMA GLOW WHICH COULD BE SEEN FOR THOUSANDS OF MILES IN ANCIENT TIMES .. THERE ARE WATER CHANNELS FROM THE RIVER NILE UNDER THE PYRAMIDS..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_34BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span kind=\"d\">\n</span>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_32B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1950966935418826789\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_32M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<span kind=\"d\"><cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. ( GEOMETRY OF OM -108), ULAM SPIRAL, LUCAS NUMBERS, PRIME NUMBER MAGIC , ISOTOPE MAGIC -- EMBEDDED IN IT.&nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<span kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span kind=\"d\">THIS IS WHY WE SAY VEDAS WERE DOWNLOADED FROM AKASHA BY MAHARISHIS , AND THERE IS NO MORTAL AUTHOR..</span><br />\n<span kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span kind=\"d\">BY RECITING VEDIC SRUTI EVERY HUMAN CONDITION OR COSMIC CONDITION COULD BE ADDRESSED AND RESOLVED INSTANTLY ..</span><br />\n<span kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span kind=\"d\">SANATANA DHARMA IS BASED ON THE SCALAR LONGITUDINAL WAVE WHICH TRAVELS FASTER THAN LIGHT..</span><br />\n<span kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span kind=\"d\">MY WIFE INTEGRATES ISOTOPE MAGIC ( SRUTI VERSES REDUCED TO DIGITS ) INTO HER DISTANT REIKI\u2014TACHYON ENERGY FASTER THAN LIGHT ..</span><br />\n<span kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span kind=\"d\">MY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">59.20 %</span></b></span><br />\n<span kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<span kind=\"d\">Capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span kind=\"d\">..</span></div>\n</div>\n<span kind=\"d\">\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_32BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; 1.20: At that time, the son of Pandu, Arjun, who had the insignia of Hanuman (&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">MY LEFT BALL</span></b>&nbsp;) on the flag of his chariot, took up his bow. Seeing your sons arrayed against him, O King, Arjun then spoke the following words to Shree Krishna.<br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">KAPIH DWAJAH IS NOT MONKEY FLAG</span><br /><span style=\"color: blue;\">KAPIH MEANS VISHNU\u2014</span><br /><span style=\"color: blue;\">\u201cKAPIH DWAJAH\u201d MEANS VISHNUs BANNER \u2013 GARUDA</span><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">KAPIH&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">( sun ) is one of the 1008 names of Vishnu in Vishnu Sahasranamah</span></b><br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">IN SANSKRIT AND MALAYALAM KAPI MEANS BROWN.<br />IN MALAYALAM WE CALL IT COFFEE COLOUR.<br />KAPI DOES NOT MEAN MONKEY IN MALAYALAM AND SANSKRIT</span></b><br /><br />###################3<br /><br />ONLY CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL HAS THE CEREBRAL WHEREWITHAL TO TELL ALL THIS..<br /><br />JEW ROTHCHILD NEVER EXPECTED A BLOGGER CAPTAIN IN TOWN !<br /><br />capt ajit vadakayil<br />..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The main\nstructure remains the same, rather today there are only 5 storeys. The top two\nstories are missing . The 6th one is elected on the ground as a separate piece.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">All around the astronomical pillar there are&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">structures</span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;for the 27 Vedic star constellations .The Muslim invader has boasted that he destroyed all 27 structures in the pavilion -- but he neglected to say that he erected the Qutab Minar.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-keK950ea7UQ/VBIH5a87aXI/AAAAAAAAv0k/zyGu_R4GH5s/s1600/nakshatra-dddchart.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The precession cycle of\n25765 years , repeats itself three times to cover all 27 nakshatras.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The lord\nof each nakshatra determines the planetary period known as the dasha, which is\nconsidered of major importance in forecasting the life path of the individual\nin Hindu astrology.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"># Name Pada 1 Pada 2 Pada 3 Pada 4</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: #141823; line-height: 17.9400005340576px;\">1 Ashwini (\u0905\u0936\u094d\u0935\u093f\u0928\u093f) \u091a\u0941 Chu \u091a\u0947 Che \u091a\u094b Cho \u0932\u093e La</span><br style=\"background-color: white; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As per our Puranas, the\nstalk of the lotus flower emerges from the navel of Lord Vishnu . It is just\nNOT a simple flower \u2013but an amazing allegory-- &nbsp;the lotus \u201cseed-pod\u201d, which is symbolically\nequivalent to the golden Mount Meru, the axis-mundi of the universe. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Qutab Minar is\nrepresentative of the Meru.&nbsp;&nbsp; Mount Meru\nis the abode of the gods and on top of Meru are present the palaces of Brahma\nand the protectors of the eight directions. &nbsp;The yugas during the approach to Vishnunabhi\nare 'ascending' yugas; those during the retreat from Brahma sits on a lotus\nwhich stems out of Vishnu\u2019s nabhi or navel.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
