font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">threats to torch an\nempty body <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">truth must lie buried<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">more promotions for\nuniformed men<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">society\u2019s unadorned\nignorance&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">can we deliver him from\nthe chains?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-F-AUzdyodT4/VA6WpQHqb4I/AAAAAAAAvn4/6J0YQvz-xoQ/s1600/blogger-image--12GG66666668.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-F-AUzdyodT4/VA6WpQHqb4I/AAAAAAAAvn4/6J0YQvz-xoQ/s1600/blogger-image--12GG66666668.jpg\" height=\"472\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Machal Lalung was\narrested in 1941, at the age of 23 from the village of Silchang in Morigaon,\nAssam. He spent 54 years in jail without facing trial. &nbsp;He was released in 2005, after the local human\nrights groups brought his case to the attention of the National Human Rights\nCommission of India. &nbsp;Lalung died in\n2007. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-xwto1XFLimY/VA-ZhyKI_RI/AAAAAAAAvoM/LwaxoXqu9B0/s1600/271207macj56hanglalung313.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-xwto1XFLimY/VA-ZhyKI_RI/AAAAAAAAvoM/LwaxoXqu9B0/s1600/271207macj56hanglalung313.jpg\" height=\"299\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After Lalung's release, he was\ntaken back to his village, where only one villager recognised him. \"We\nhanded him over to the village headman but could not find his family or\nrelatives\" said a police official.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1968 Jagjivan Ram\nYadav, detained without trial for 38 years in the northern state of Uttar\nPradesh, was freed on bail by the Supreme Court.&nbsp; Yadav, arrested for allegedly killing a\nneighbour's wife in 1968, was never charged.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Lrw3ZQr-RIo/VA-Z-6JF65I/AAAAAAAAvoU/GRw6kGL3DFo/s1600/07jaffg2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Lrw3ZQr-RIo/VA-Z-6JF65I/AAAAAAAAvoU/GRw6kGL3DFo/s1600/07jaffg2.jpg\" height=\"320\" width=\"176\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Police who got rewards for cracking the murder conveniently claimed that\nthey lost the case records. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">His 65-year-old wife Patto\nDevi recounted how she had given up her husband for dead and clad herself in\nwidow\u2019s white . &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cIt was hell for the\nlast three decades for me. Now I hope to spend the remaining years of our life\ntogether,\u201d Patto Devi said.</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-mKqn9rLueuA/VA6VugzfrAI/AAAAAAAAvnw/f27B52QP5N4/s1600/imageUU8s.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-mKqn9rLueuA/VA6VugzfrAI/AAAAAAAAvnw/f27B52QP5N4/s1600/imageUU8s.jpg\" height=\"299\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yadav's plight\nexemplifies the fate of seven out of 10 Indian prisoners \u2013 more than 70% of\n322,000 inmates in India's 1,135 prisons are awaiting trial.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; India's prisons officially have capacity\nfor 237,000. 224,000 of inmates are on remand.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">87% of prisoners in\nBihar's prisons are on remand awaiting trial.&nbsp;\nA lot of prisoners are very old over the age of 70.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The police take months\nto file charges, lawyers delay filing cases , judges are absent leading to\nfrequent adjournments and the accused are not produced in time, as there were\nno vans . &nbsp;Most of Bihar's 55 jails, for\nexample, simply do not have enough prison vans to transport prisoners to the\ncourts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The absence of\nwitnesses and OBJECTIVE evidence &nbsp;impeded\n20 % of hearings.&nbsp; Innocent &nbsp;remand prisoners are often released after\nwasting away their entire youvan in jails.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Police love to show their smartness by slapping as many IPC sections as\npossible.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-RABwIIIIaNQ/VA-e-MOn99I/AAAAAAAAvok/58gzx8cugao/s1600/imagsswes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-RABwIIIIaNQ/VA-e-MOn99I/AAAAAAAAvok/58gzx8cugao/s1600/imagsswes.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The judges do NOT pull up the police and ask them to justify why\nunwarranted IPC sections are slapped for sadist reasons .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-qFSe8RMo6r0/VA-fueJTMkI/AAAAAAAAvos/AObNPegNWlU/s1600/01f2edbb-yy331b-412e-8fcf-56724f965a93.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-qFSe8RMo6r0/VA-fueJTMkI/AAAAAAAAvos/AObNPegNWlU/s1600/01f2edbb-yy331b-412e-8fcf-56724f965a93.png\" height=\"320\" width=\"278\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every IPC section adds up. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When a judge is\nconvinces that a poor man will have to go to remand prison just because he\ncannot afford the bail, &nbsp;&nbsp;or provide bond surety , why &nbsp;cant he be compassionate and just &nbsp;relax the terms ?&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Sometimes\nthis poor man has nobody to stand bond surety for him, &nbsp;the way the judge wants ( with originals of\nAadhar card, ration card , salary certificate &nbsp;etc ). &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Does the judge even know how the court clerks who\nwear cheap chappals , but expensive underwear &nbsp;milk money ? &nbsp;&nbsp;Of course , he was a lawyer before, right ? &nbsp;He knows the \"usual\" procedure. &nbsp;A rich\nman will get anticipatory bail 100% even if the charge is non-bailable? &nbsp;Does the judge even know how dirty and stinking a court toilet is &nbsp;?<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Of course it is\nunderstood that certain people may hide or attempt to tamper with the case in\nsome way\u2014for critical cases . &nbsp;But for\nsimple things like IT act ( of Bunty Sibal ) defamation, &nbsp;stealing a chapatti, &nbsp;having a physical fight , &nbsp;jumping a red light ? -- he is gonna tamper\nwith the red light?&nbsp;</span><br />\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-fPKLAkWJDvs/VB5Aik2sHGI/AAAAAAAAwNQ/Nl-0aMawzGI/s1600/EEE0.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-fPKLAkWJDvs/VB5Aik2sHGI/AAAAAAAAwNQ/Nl-0aMawzGI/s1600/EEE0.jpg\" height=\"300\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Does the judge know\nthat 99% of the time it is the culprit who runs to the police first \u2013 &nbsp;shouting that he has been defamed or beaten up\n. &nbsp;Is telling the truth defamation or\nhate speech ? &nbsp;&nbsp;Most of the time whoever paid more bribe for\nthe FIR calls the shots.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Inability to get bail,\nsudden isolation from a loving family and the social stigma of prison are\nreasons that lead to acute depression. Remand prisoners are supposed to be\ntreated as though they are not guilty. &nbsp;However,\nthey are treated shabbily as if they have committed a crime. Is this democracy\n? Is this what our constitution wants ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Remand is supposed to\nbe used by the judge only when he is 100% sure that there is a grave risk to\nthe public outside the jail &nbsp;\u2013 but we all\nknow this is never &nbsp;the case. &nbsp;In developed nations they put leg collars\nwhich can track the movement of such people . It is a cheap and simple device.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Trials also drag on\nbecause of a shortage of judges - India has only 10.5 judges per million\npeople.&nbsp; We need atleast&nbsp; 60 judges per million. &nbsp;Our Supreme court is quick to point out that\nthe executive and legislature are too slow. &nbsp;The judicray shoots through the holster ,\nright? \u2013they are that faaaast ? \u2013like Sudden.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By the way Sudden used\nto be my favourite novel series as a young child.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>SUDDEN , BY OLIVER\nSTRANGE &nbsp;VADAKAYIL</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">India's National Police\nCommission has said more than 60% of arrests are unjustified as police see\nimprisonment as an easy solution to check spiraling crime.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A prisoner on remand is\nsomeone who is imprisoned before the start of his trial. &nbsp;He is desperately poor and cannot afford a\nlawyer, bond or bail.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because the\nprisoner has not been formally tried, he is presumed to be innocent under the\nprinciples of natural justice . He is entitled to special benefits and\ntreatment that are not offered to regular prisoners. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Being on remand can &nbsp;be stressful and emotionally distressing, if a\nprisoner is innocent . Why should he suffer because the judiciary is too slow\nin India?&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today we see the Indian govt holding\nback the innocent Italian marines, who have killed by mistake &nbsp;.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When a case does NOT\nwarrant a term in jail , why put the man in remand prison . The police must be\npunished if they slap unwarranted IPC sections , &nbsp;just to keep the man in prison , so that they\ncan get promotions.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even lawyers struggle to convict a man\u2014 so that he can add\nthat as a feather on his cap. &nbsp;He will\noften boast about it &nbsp;\u2013 for putting\ninnocent men in prison ?&nbsp; These are the\npeople who become judges later.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">More than 1/3 of the &nbsp;people remanded in prison went on to receive a\nsentence that wasn\u2019t prison in India over the past decade. &nbsp;Then why put him in remand prison \u2013just because\nhe cannot afford bail ? line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WE HAVE OUR BENAMI MAIN STREAM MEDIA FUNDED AND CONTROLLED FROM ABROAD, &nbsp;ENGAGED IN COVERT SEDITION\n.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Remand prisoners\nespecially juveniles must NOT be put in prisons far away from their family. Imagine being condemned to jail without trial\njust because you were pointed out at an Identification parade by a so- called\ncomplainant\u2014or even a false complaint after bribing the police to file an FIR..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In many cases, the accused is a mere suspect and there is no clear evidence\nagainst him proving his guilt. &nbsp;Many\ntimes the police just tells a arrested person to sign on the dotted line , in a\nlanguage the man does NOT understand.&nbsp; This\nmeans that the accused is unaware of what the police investigator wrote as his\nstatement and is unaware of what he has signed on to.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If he hesitates to sign on the dotted line,\nthe accused is not taken to court for a long period of time after his arrest. &nbsp;Some detainees have reported remaining in a\npolice cell for months before going to court.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The pre-charge detention period\nis the period of time during which an individual can be held and questioned by\npolice, prior to being charged with an offense\u2014and this must be monitored .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Police are quick to\npresume the accused as being guilty rather than to presume his innocence until\nproved guilty. When beating the accused, the police officers consistently\nthreaten to beat the accused to death or until he confesses. &nbsp;&nbsp;That 70 per cent of India's prisoners are on\nremand is nearly the highest in the world, with only Liberia, Haiti and Mali being\nhigher.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It would be a fair\nyardstick to say that any democratic nation with more than 10% cent of its\nprisoners on remand is not functioning satisfactorily --any nation with over 50\nper cent is hardly functioning at all.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is common knowledge\nthat murders and jail guard abuse deaths are termed suicides.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Video conferencing ( electronic\nvideo linkage) must be used in courts to avoid excessive escort police, to\ndispose off minor cases . This is the first major step for bringing jail\nreforms.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Social organization in\nprison revolves around vicious prison gangs and no good role models in jails to\nbe followed. Many prisoners are beaten, raped, brutalized or made to live in\nfear.
