, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ASHWAMEDHA horse\nsacrifice is such a FAKE story.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In reality Ashwamedha\nyagam is a bloodless homam after a VOTE OF CONFIDENCE using a white horse\n--allowed to be done only by King of Gods and mighty emperors of earth rivaling\nHindu gods in respect earned .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/--SrC0JC1Qig/VAw-Z_B7XrI/AAAAAAAAvkk/tWWgLImdAlE/s1600/scaion0031.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"508\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/--SrC0JC1Qig/VAw-Z_B7XrI/AAAAAAAAvkk/tWWgLImdAlE/s1600/scaion0031.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So what does the vulgar\nIndophile ( like Wendy Donger ) or Wikipedia say about Ashwamedha sacrifice?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here it is ---- ( you\ncan check out the horrible and foul lies yourself by Googling ASHVAMEDHA YAGNA\nWIKIPEDIA ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<b><i><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE:--</span></i></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anyone who should stop the horse is ritually cursed, and a&nbsp;</span></i><i><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">dog is killed&nbsp;</span></i><i><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">..</span></i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The queens walk around the dead horse reciting mantras. The chief\nqueen then has to&nbsp;</span></i><i><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">mimic copulation with the dead horse</span></i><i><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">, while the other\nqueens&nbsp;</span></i><i><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ritually utter obscenities&nbsp;</span></i><i><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">( probably they were\nsinging&nbsp; ribald songs like DARA SINGH KA&nbsp; LUND--&nbsp; TEE HEEEE ! ).</span></i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the next morning, the priests&nbsp;</span></i><i><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">raise the queen from the\nplace where she has spent the night with the horse.</span></i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The three queens with a hundred golden, silver and copper needles\nindicate the lines on the horse's body along which it will be dissected. The\nhorse is dissected, and its</span></i><i><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;flesh roasted</span></i><i><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.</span></i><i><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Various parts are offered\nto a host of deities&nbsp;</span></i><i><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">and personified concepts with&nbsp;</span></i><i><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">utterances of svaha\n\"all-hail\".</span></i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The human sacrifice, the Purushamedha, followed a similar\nformat,&nbsp; but included a&nbsp;</span></i><i><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">man with the animals to be sacrificed.</span></i><i><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The price of the\nman was set at one thousand cows and a hundred horses. Like the horse, the man\nchosen for sacrifice was allowed to wander for a year. Once he had been\nkilled,&nbsp;</span></i><i><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">the queen lay with his corpse.</span></i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Laws of Manu refer to the Ashvamedha (V.53): 'The man who\noffers a horse-sacrifice every day for a hundred years, and the man who does\nnot eat meat, the two of them reap the same fruit of good deeds.</span></i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Mahabharata, the sacrifice is performed by Yudhishtira\n(.&nbsp;</span></i><i><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the horse was cut into parts, Draupadi had to sit beside the\nparts of the horse</span></i><i><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.)</span></i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ritual was performed&nbsp;</span></i><i><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">in strict compliance with\nVedic prescriptions</span></i><i><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;(1.14.10). Dasaratha's chief wife Kausalya circumambulates\nthe horse and ritually pierces its flesh (1.14.33).</span></i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then \"Queen Kausalya desiring the results of ritual\ndisconcertedly resided one night with that horse that flew away like a\nbird.\" .</span></i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the conclusion of the ritual&nbsp;</span></i><i><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dasharatha symbolically\noffers his other wives to the presiding priests</span></i><i><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">, who return them in\nexchange for expensive gifts.</span></i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;\"An empire is like a horse and the subjects like other\ninferior animals\" (p. 448). Thus, VSM 23.22, literally \"he beats on\nthe</span></i><i><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;vulva&nbsp;</span></i><i><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(gabha), the&nbsp;</span></i><i><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">penis&nbsp;</span></i><i><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(pasas)&nbsp;</span></i><i><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">oozes repeatedly</span></i><i><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;(ni-galgaliti)</span></i><i><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">in the receptacle\"</span></i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201c&nbsp;</span></i><i><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The three authors of the Vedas were buffoons, knaves, and demons</span></i><i><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">. All the well-known\nformulae of the pandits, jarphari, turphari, etc. and all the</span></i><i><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;obscene rites for\nthe queen commanded in Aswamedha,</span></i><i><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;these were invented by buffoons, and so\nall the various kinds of presents to the priests, while the&nbsp;</span></i><i><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">eating of flesh was\nsimilarly commanded by night-prowling demons</span></i><i><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.\u201d</span></i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mock bestiality ( sexual intercourse with animals ) and\nnecrophilia ( sexual attraction to dead animals ) involved in the ritual&nbsp;</span></i><i><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">caused considerable\nconsternation among the scholars first editing the Yajurveda. Griffith (1899)\nomits verses VSM 23.20\u201331 (the ritual obscenities), protesting that they are\n\"n</span></i><i><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ot\nreproducible even in the semi-obscurity of a learned European language\"\n(alluding to other instances where he renders explicit scenes in Latin rather\nthan English)</span></i><i><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">. A. B. Keith's 1914 translation also omits verses.</span></i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This part of the ritual offended the Dalit reformer and framer of\nthe Indian constitution&nbsp;</span></i><i><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">B. R. Ambedkar&nbsp;</span></i><i><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">and is frequently\nmentioned in his writings as an example of the perceived degradation of\nBrahmanical culture.</span></i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<b><i><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">UNQUOTE:</span></i></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-jBEcpuEn974/VAw7XIZ9vgI/AAAAAAAAvjM/IYGLl4ad_uM/s1600/downddload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"232\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-jBEcpuEn974/VAw7XIZ9vgI/AAAAAAAAvjM/IYGLl4ad_uM/s1600/downddload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">They have even given a\npicture of the Queen lying down with the dead horse ( the prick of the horse is\nto be used as dildo for sexual gratification ) -- this picture was painted by a\nMuslim painter Sahibdin.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-0saMUIn-Pi0/VAw7E6Zu1gI/AAAAAAAAvjE/J7qmC7bUCkM/s1600/300px-Asvamehhdha_ramayana.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"221\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-0saMUIn-Pi0/VAw7E6Zu1gI/AAAAAAAAvjE/J7qmC7bUCkM/s1600/300px-Asvamehhdha_ramayana.JPG\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">They say he painted it\nin 1652 AD , which is a lie.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">So all Indian Hindus are\nfools and perverts except our dalit&nbsp;&nbsp;BR Ambedkar, right ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Recently CNN IBN , the\nforeign funded TV station held a sham poll, to find out the greatest Indian\nafter Gandhi.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;We MUST believe that Gandhi is the\ngreatest-- this is compulsory!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now who is BR\nAmbedkar?&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was taken to Columbia\nUnivesity to inject poison into the Vedas. Being a dalit there is no way, he\ncould have laid his hand of the Vedas.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Out there in USA he\nwrote a book mocking Hinduism by the name of&nbsp;&nbsp;RIDDLES IN HINDUISM, in\nleague with the white Christian missionaries.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Goole search -</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">CNN IBN POLL, GREATEST INDIAN SINCE GANDHI VADAKAYIL&nbsp;</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">So what is the truth\nabout ASHWAMEDHA YAGNA?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The truth is the horse\nis NOT killed at all-- leave alone the queen having sexual intercourse with a\ndead horse's you know what..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">A spirited horse is\nchosen , with white fur and no blemishes.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A yagna (\nAgnihotra homam ) is held BEFORE the horse sets out on a guided tour.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ashwamedha yagna cannot\nbe held by a mortal.&nbsp;&nbsp;It is held by the king of Gods Indra.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;It\ncan only be done by a mortal king if he has the sanction to do it by an avatar\nof Vishnu.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">This tradition of\n&nbsp;deva monopoly was broken by King Mahabali of Kerala. &nbsp;&nbsp;He was\nan asura (demon) king.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The people of Kerala were very happy\nwith this king as he was a wise and just ruler, and there was prosperity all\nover. &nbsp;The people were so happy in his Kingdom that they stopped\nworshipping the gods.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Goaded by his admirers and Maharishi Shukracharya ,\nAsura King Mahabali did the Ashwameda yagna. &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>The king now became an undisputed emperor .</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-R8WkFKONmfY/VAw8FiXit2I/AAAAAAAAvjc/6xp87uAQMkI/s1600/imaffges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"142\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-R8WkFKONmfY/VAw8FiXit2I/AAAAAAAAvjc/6xp87uAQMkI/s1600/imaffges.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every\nneighboring king must accept the Emperor who is doing this Yaga as his\nemperor\u2014which makes&nbsp;&nbsp;him a vassal king .&nbsp;&nbsp;The Yaga can back\nfire and cause imminent war .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Those days all gods\nbelonged to one sect called Devas, while King Mahabali ( or Maveli ) belonged\nto the Asura sect.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">This made Indra , the\nking of rival Devas , very jealous, as this was his prerogative, and nobody had\nthe guts to kill or capture &nbsp;the white Ashwamedha horse&nbsp;&nbsp;of King\nMahabali.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He prevailed on Aditi,\nhis mother to convince Vishnu to correct this imbalance, where an Asura King\ncould cock a snook at the King of Gods . Vishnu decided to intervene and took\nthe 5th&nbsp;&nbsp;avatar of Vamana --a blue faced Brahmin midget ( dwarf ) .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Brahmin dwarf asked\nKing Mahabali for alms-- a small grant of land.&nbsp;&nbsp;The King told him\nthat he can take as much land area as he wished, within his kingdom . But the\nmidget wanted only three strides ( paces )&nbsp;&nbsp;of land.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Immediately the kings\nadvisor Sage Shukracharya who was a seer, advised his king NOT to agree to this\nrequest, as he suspected something amiss and was sure of foul play.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mahabali being a very\ngenerous king, could NOT imagine going back on his word, during a divine\nsacrifice, which was all about honour and keeping a word of honour.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-NwmsmzMauJc/VAw-LfUO_FI/AAAAAAAAvkc/iDW6KIOw-eY/s1600/vamanadddev-sukracarya.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-NwmsmzMauJc/VAw-LfUO_FI/AAAAAAAAvkc/iDW6KIOw-eY/s1600/vamanadddev-sukracarya.jpg\" width=\"291\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sage Shukracharya,&nbsp;&nbsp;still\ntried a last ditch manoevere.&nbsp;&nbsp;He shrank in size using his powers and\nwent inside the spout of the ritual water jug Kamandalu, from which holy\ntheertham has to be poured to seal the promise as a divine ritual,\n&nbsp;sealing the deal.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The midget being Lord\nVishnu knew this would happen and had a straw ready in his hand .&nbsp;&nbsp;He\nshoved the straw into the spout gouging out Shukracharya\u2019s left eye.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since this day on, the\nguru of the asuras has been known to be one eyed<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-2KoCuJvDbeQ/VAxD6yoagxI/AAAAAAAAvmU/kw7XLhCApQQ/s1600/imaugbges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-2KoCuJvDbeQ/VAxD6yoagxI/AAAAAAAAvmU/kw7XLhCApQQ/s1600/imaugbges.jpg\" width=\"302\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">So he agreed to grant\nthe boon of three paces of land.&nbsp;&nbsp;The midget Brahmin Vamanar\nimmediately assumed the gigantic form of Vishnu ( the Preserver lord ) and in\nthe first two steps covered the whole of earth and cosmos.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-oF-QzFhhVXM/VAw_ZRV5EuI/AAAAAAAAvlE/86ymVWncr6A/s1600/imagesCAKLeeTV28.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-oF-QzFhhVXM/VAw_ZRV5EuI/AAAAAAAAvlE/86ymVWncr6A/s1600/imagesCAKLeeTV28.jpg\" width=\"237\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then he asked the king\nwhere he should keep his third step. The king bowed down on his knees and told\nhim to place the third step on his head.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-6HlyGNI7L20/VAw_TzdzUCI/AAAAAAAAvk8/I01yt1hgC2U/s1600/imagesCAYPUCFUhh.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-6HlyGNI7L20/VAw_TzdzUCI/AAAAAAAAvk8/I01yt1hgC2U/s1600/imagesCAYPUCFUhh.jpg\" width=\"299\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before that he asked\nthat he should be able to visit and bless his subjects once every year .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vishnu granted this boon\nand placed his foot on Mahabali's head and instead of driving him underground\nto the netherworld , he sent him to heaven -- pleased with his righteousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS IS THE REASON WHY\nALL MALAYALIS CELEBRATE ONAM -- THE DAY THE KING WILL COME EVERY\nYEAR.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is a grand festival\ncelebrated by Christians and Muslims in Kerala too. Such is the love and\nplesant memory evoked by an Asura king under whose rule Kerala prospered .\n&nbsp;People pray that such peace and prosperity should come back-- &nbsp;yet\nthe whole thing is more about GRATITUDE than greed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">A carpet of fresh\nflowers is laid at the entrance of every house in Kerala .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">DIWALI OR DEEPAWALI\nMARKS THE VICTORY OF GODS , OR DEFEAT OF KING MAHABALI .&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">HENCE DIWALI , IS\nCELEBRATED BY THE WHOLE OF INDIA -- EXCEPT KERALA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">So why is the unmanned\nwhite horse on a guided run across the emperor\u2019s own kingdom and neighbouring\nkingdoms ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the essence of\nAshwameda Yaga.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The emperor seeks to\ncheck out if any of his vassal kings surrounding his empire want to challenge\nhis supreme authority \u2014 in public.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The horse is guided by\nthe emperor\u2019s generals and chosen ministers .&nbsp;&nbsp;They young princes\ngenerals follow the white horse , on their own horses.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-MOZMzWcnoNM/VAw9BXwenLI/AAAAAAAAvj0/00hQKEM-6Ik/s1600/downloadHKJJhhUTC.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"281\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-MOZMzWcnoNM/VAw9BXwenLI/AAAAAAAAvj0/00hQKEM-6Ik/s1600/downloadHKJJhhUTC.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white horse with\nclanging bells is made to run&nbsp;&nbsp;through the vassal kingdoms.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This\nis announced well in advance.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-WX1flN5LgSc/VAw-uf40eWI/AAAAAAAAvks/ZbKV4L7_6Wg/s1600/scadden0030.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"316\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-WX1flN5LgSc/VAw-uf40eWI/AAAAAAAAvks/ZbKV4L7_6Wg/s1600/scadden0030.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Any vassal king can kill /\ncapture the horse and thus declare war on the Emperor,&nbsp;&nbsp;which will\nhappen pretty soon.&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">If he just captures the horse,\nthere may be room for negotiation for certain terms .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-pnIA7um-7WQ/VAw9WmZeJkI/AAAAAAAAvj8/QmaJcMYtDXo/s1600/scan00ff32.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"316\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-pnIA7um-7WQ/VAw9WmZeJkI/AAAAAAAAvj8/QmaJcMYtDXo/s1600/scan00ff32.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The horse is even taken\nto enemy kingdoms,&nbsp;&nbsp;and there is \u201cdiplomatic immunity\u201d for the\nEmperor\u2019s men not the white horse.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the horse is unmolested these\nenemy kingdoms will be spared of any assault.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Any tough acting\nintentions are gauged out.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the horse returns\nsafe and sound, it means all is well&nbsp;&nbsp;-- and the emperor's supreme\nauthority is unchallenged.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;And all know it too.&nbsp;&nbsp;This\nis an utmost transparent procedure .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the POST Ashwamedha\nyagna all vassal kings are invited,&nbsp;&nbsp;and there are celebrations all\naround,&nbsp;&nbsp;for peace and prosperity&nbsp;&nbsp;in future.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-M5REIZv_qDA/VAw8uA0XqsI/AAAAAAAAvjk/EqLNdPUQQvQ/s1600/eeer.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"305\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-M5REIZv_qDA/VAw8uA0XqsI/AAAAAAAAvjk/EqLNdPUQQvQ/s1600/eeer.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Soldiers\ngo home to their families.&nbsp;&nbsp;Such was the honour , that there would be\nNO attack by deceit. The authority is the emperor is declared as Supreme .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN MODERN TERMS THIS IS\nLIKE A OPEN \"CONFIDENCE \" MOTION IN THE ELECTED DEMOCRATIC\nPARLIAMENT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">By the way Shukracharya\n, the mentor of the Aruras , is the God of many people on this planet and this\nincludes the Persians and the Arabians in ancient times..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">SHUKRACHARYA IS AHURA\nMAZDA GOD OF THE PARSIS, VADAKAYIL</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shukracharya's bitter\nrival Brihaspati , the mentor of the davas , is the God of the western lands .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is why they still\nsay \u201cALLAH KA SHUKRA HAI \u201c. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Vedic astrology,\nthere is a dasha or planetary period known as Shukra Dasha which remains active\nin a person's horoscope for 20 years, this is the longest dasha among all\nplanets. This dasha is believed to give more wealth, fortune and luxury to a\nperson's life if they have Shukra positioned well in their horoscope.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before prophet Muhammad\ncreated Islam, he was a worshipper of Shukracharya \u2013as he was a Namboodiri .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brihaspati was the\nmentor&nbsp; ( guru ) of the devas of India\u2014\nGod of the people in Europe also known as Zeus/ Ammon/ Thor..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>THOR, ZEUS, MARDUK,\nAMMON, BRIHASPATI AND JUPITER&nbsp; VADAKAYIL</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both Shukracharya and\nBrihaspati were classmates\u2014under a teacher Maharishi Angirasa&nbsp; who was the father of Brihaspati.&nbsp; This guru showed endless partiality to his\nown son Brihaspati though he was inferior in every respect to\nShukracharya.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Getting upset,\nShukracharya offered his services to the bitter enemy of Devas ( who has\nemployed Brihaspati ) the asuras.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The asura ( demon )\nKing of my home state King Mahabali employed Shukracharya as his political\nadvisor.&nbsp; In his rule the land of Kerala\nprospered due to excellent advise from Shukracharya making the Gods ( devas )\njealous.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Ikm8fZjMK6g/VAw_LwnkkEI/AAAAAAAAvk0/t7TLbLwsJfE/s1600/downloffrad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Mayan civilization\nworshipped another Asura, Maya danava.&nbsp;\nIn ancient days Peru area was PATALA. The asuras took refuge when they\nwere attacked by Devas here.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">MAYA , INCA , AZTEC\nCIVILIZATIONS DECODED&nbsp; VADAKAYIL .</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maya Danava had his own\nvimana ( flying saucer )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As per our puranas\n,&nbsp; the Mecca oasis was called&nbsp; 'Makeshwar' ,&nbsp;\na place were Vedic agnihotra havanams were performed . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kaabaleshwar was the\nname of the Shiva temple ( with the black stone ) \u2013&nbsp; where a Namboodiri family were hereditary\npriests , and they were Muhammad\u2019s ansectors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This Shina temple was\nowned belonged to the king of Calicut\u2014&nbsp;\nas it also doubled a as a trade post ( spices ) and camel watering\nplace.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">VEDIC PRACTICES IN\nMECCA VADAKAYIL<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Makh in sanskrit means\n'Havan' or 'Yagya'.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There were 360 temples\nin Kaaba with the grand Kaabaleshara Shiva temple housing a most powerful shiva\nlingam black stone in the centre.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white historian of\nBritannica says the truth ( for a change )&nbsp;\nwhen they counted and recorded 360 idols inside Kaaba.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHY DO MUSLIMS HAVE A\nHOLIDAY&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">ON FRIDAY AND THEY PRAY\nCOMPULSORILY ?</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FRIDAY IS KNOWN AS\nSHUKRAVARAM&nbsp; IN MALAYALAM&nbsp; AND&nbsp;\nSANSKRIT .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ON FRIDAY SHUKRACHARYA\nWAS BORN.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After this Vamana\navatar Vishnu, came later as avatars Parashurama,&nbsp; Rama ,&nbsp;\nKrishna ( 4000 BC )&nbsp; and\nAyyappa&nbsp; .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After Mahabali left Kerala , the land was\noppressed by the Kshatriya ruling class.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-dk9JXOAjsFA/VAw84Uzko5I/AAAAAAAAvjs/-qutIh6yX20/s1600/imaccges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"364\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-dk9JXOAjsFA/VAw84Uzko5I/AAAAAAAAvjs/-qutIh6yX20/s1600/imaccges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Parashurama's ( Ram\nwith an axe ) mission was to destroy the oppressing Kshatriyas. He threw his\naxe northwards along the coast line from Kanyakumari and reclaimed land from\nthe sea, as per lore.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">King Mahabali's\ngrandfather was Prahalad whose father Hiranyakashyap was slain by Vishnu in his\nNarasimha avatar ( before Vamana avatar ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Yoga Vasistha Lord\nRama asks his guru Sage Vasistha , who King Mahabali was, and the answer he got\nwas that he was a great king and was protected by Lord Vishnu.&nbsp; Lord Shiva killed Banasura the evil son of\nKing Mahabali .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: red;\">Above , you find a picture of the flower carpet we made in our home to welcome King Mahabali on\nOnam day in 2011</span></i><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
