, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Below : &nbsp; find the\npicture of the flower carpet made today 7th Sept 2014 ( it has a GARUDA theme )</span></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-JnQYW4wLZL4/VAw5BQnTt9I/AAAAAAAAviw/-pmtitfMMWY/s1600/onam%2B2014.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"404\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-JnQYW4wLZL4/VAw5BQnTt9I/AAAAAAAAviw/-pmtitfMMWY/s1600/onam%2B2014.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">See how time flies !<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-BIcToWBdINk/VAxBEW5-MYI/AAAAAAAAvlY/X6Zm7LS-lNQ/s1600/as.jpegVBTRS.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-BIcToWBdINk/VAxBEW5-MYI/AAAAAAAAvlY/X6Zm7LS-lNQ/s1600/as.jpegVBTRS.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The cultural heritage of\nKerala comes into full bloom at this time.We in Kerala are proud of our culture\nand heritage, the oldest culture on this planet--&nbsp;&nbsp;the land of\nAstrology, Math , &nbsp;Kalari and Ayurveda-- and our beautiful fertile\nland,&nbsp;&nbsp;the most beautiful land on this planet.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-MbWDOxYqRac/VAxBKNHrU1I/AAAAAAAAvlg/3OOfwdRKih4/s1600/kalari%2Bbbhfefhe2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"273\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-MbWDOxYqRac/VAxBKNHrU1I/AAAAAAAAvlg/3OOfwdRKih4/s1600/kalari%2Bbbhfefhe2.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Onam knows NO religion,\nlanguage , caste, creed, sex, age, political leanings, financial status, or any\nother barriers. It is a unique festival-- the No 1 festival of Kerala-- at\nharvest time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-oDUEm9Bpk5M/VAxEqJ3SCuI/AAAAAAAAvmk/YA9blWu2x2I/s1600/sri-gangaee-devi.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-oDUEm9Bpk5M/VAxEqJ3SCuI/AAAAAAAAvmk/YA9blWu2x2I/s1600/sri-gangaee-devi.jpg\" width=\"408\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Ashwameda Yagam is also\nconnected with the birth of river Ganges.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">A free spirited horse ,\nwhich diverted from its path, stopped running and was hanging around a\nMaharishi in deep meditation caused a domino of events which gave birth to\nriver Ganges .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kIUvQzEqEnA/VAw98OTIqXI/AAAAAAAAvkU/nNeRrHEPP_4/s1600/Picture%2Bffe996.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kIUvQzEqEnA/VAw98OTIqXI/AAAAAAAAvkU/nNeRrHEPP_4/s1600/Picture%2Bffe996.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ancient&nbsp;&nbsp;kingdom\nof Ayodhya was ruled by the childless king Bhagiratha, who desperately yearned\nfor Ganga to come down and wash away the sins of his forefathers.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Even\nthough he ruled over a prosperous kingdom inhabited by happy people,\nBhaigiratha remained sad, as he was childless. He was also saddled with the\nburden of giving moksha to his ancestors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">A long time ago, King\nSagar, the then ruler of Ayodhya, had sent his grandson Suman to search for his\n60,000 sons which were borne to him by his second wife Sumati. (She had\nactually borne a gourd which burst open to give way to these sixty\nthousand\u2014test tube babies .)&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">These sons, who were\nfostered by nurses in jars of ghee till they grew up to handsome boys.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;They\nsuddenly disappeared mysteriously while they were searching for a lost\nwhite let loose by emperor Sagar as a part of\nthe great&nbsp;&nbsp;Ashamedha Yagna.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">If this sacrifice had\nreached its logical conclusion, Sagar would have become the undisputed master\nof the Gods.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The great sage Kapila\nwho, impressed by Suman's humble demeanor, told him that all his sixty thousand\nuncles had been turned to ashes by his angry gaze when they tried to blame him\nfor stealing the white Ashwamedha horse.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-HgyQ7pndfog/VAw9isQDuCI/AAAAAAAAvkE/RLl99Ir-3Ak/s1600/downloffead.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-HgyQ7pndfog/VAw9isQDuCI/AAAAAAAAvkE/RLl99Ir-3Ak/s1600/downloffead.jpg\" width=\"336\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The unmanned white horse\nwas too fast and powerful for its followers to keep pursuit. Feeling strange\nvibes the horse had homed in into the&nbsp;&nbsp;ashram of a Maharishi and was\nrelaxing&nbsp;&nbsp;next to the meditating Maharishi.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-EuN7LJkcyhU/VAw9x8G1I9I/AAAAAAAAvkM/3ulCUaSg8jU/s1600/16400nddfggj3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"333\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-EuN7LJkcyhU/VAw9x8G1I9I/AAAAAAAAvkM/3ulCUaSg8jU/s1600/16400nddfggj3.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maharishi Kapila warned\nthat the dead princes would not arrive in heaven by immersion of their ashes in\njust any river water. Only the celestial Ganga, which flows with its sacred\nwater in the heavenly world, could provide salvation.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Time passed by and King\nSagar died with a heavy&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Suman was now the king, and he ruled\nhis kingdom well. When old age crept upon him, he crowned his son Dileepa as\nking and proceeded to the Himalayas to undergo sever penances, to bring the\nGanga down to the earth.&nbsp;&nbsp;But he died before his penance bore fruit.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-_AvFScrEXDI/VAw_hSQjryI/AAAAAAAAvlM/bUSvzPKB8v0/s1600/imy45uaddges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-_AvFScrEXDI/VAw_hSQjryI/AAAAAAAAvlM/bUSvzPKB8v0/s1600/imy45uaddges.jpg\" width=\"323\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">King Dileepa knew the\nlast wishes of his father and grandfather .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He performed many yagnas\n(fire ritual) on the advice of sages.&nbsp;&nbsp;Pangs of sorrow at not being\nable to fulfill the family's aspiration infected him, and he fell ill.&nbsp;&nbsp;Seeing\nthat he was wasting away , he placed his son Bhagiratha on the throne;\nentrusting him with the mission of completing the task still left undone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bhagiratha soon handed\nthe kingdom over to his prime minister and went to the Himalayas, performing\nterrible austerities for a long time&nbsp;&nbsp;to draw the Ganga down from the\nskies. Eventually, humbled by the dogged dedication of the ascetic king, Ganga\nappeared in human form and agreed to purify the ashes of Bhagiratha's\nancestors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Ganga agreed to\nbless the earth, a fear loomed. Will the unholy earth be able to withstand the\nmighty pressures of the descending waters ?.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ZJQeNa0f9wo/VAxC7lf7_WI/AAAAAAAAvmE/XKn_xHHxzTg/s1600/imagg3tgges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"301\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ZJQeNa0f9wo/VAxC7lf7_WI/AAAAAAAAvmE/XKn_xHHxzTg/s1600/imagg3tgges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">To save the world from\nirreversible calamity, Bhagiratha prayed to Lord Shiva . Shiva assured\nBhariratha that we would receive the impact on his matted locks -to enable the\ngushing waters to exhaust their, furious energy beforehand and then flow gently\non earth..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Ganga rushed fell in\na mighty torrent onto Shiva's and calmed down in the passage through Lord\nShiva\u2019s&nbsp;&nbsp;matted locks.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-V9uSL2wGAqI/VAxDduoOEPI/AAAAAAAAvmM/94AL815J4fc/s1600/Panch-Prayag_May4yp_708x519.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"468\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-V9uSL2wGAqI/VAxDduoOEPI/AAAAAAAAvmM/94AL815J4fc/s1600/Panch-Prayag_May4yp_708x519.gif\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Mother Goddess fell upon the earth, in\nseven distinct streams: Hladini, Nalini and Pavani flowed east, Subhikshu,\nSitha and Sindhu flowed west, and the seventh stream followed the chariot of\nBhagiratha to the place where the ashes of his great-grandfathers lay in heaps-\nsouls awaiting moksha .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Ganga flowed over\nthe ashes of the 60,000 sons of King Sagar to deliver moksha , and usher the\nsouls to the gilded gates of Vaikunta..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-KSpkyOMbXBY/VAxER71gIPI/AAAAAAAAvmc/J7tF080_IAg/s1600/Gangafollowedrr_22857.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"292\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-KSpkyOMbXBY/VAxER71gIPI/AAAAAAAAvmc/J7tF080_IAg/s1600/Gangafollowedrr_22857.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The celestial Ganga, is still falling\nfrom the heavens, timeless- gushing through Shiva's tangled locks, down to the\nearth, where sinners and worthy men alike flock to bathe in her waters and\ndrink a gulpful .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-N_PYxgIOUC8/VAxCu8eeO5I/AAAAAAAAvl8/xQYhp5UlolA/s1600/imwerages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-N_PYxgIOUC8/VAxCu8eeO5I/AAAAAAAAvl8/xQYhp5UlolA/s1600/imwerages.jpg\" width=\"293\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_84B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1355131828973993083\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_84M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/08173368436479307173\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Anurag Shukla</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_8.html?showComment=1515577636725#c1355131828973993083\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 10, 2018 at 3:17 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_84MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nFollow your inner voice. When reading bhaja govindam previously, even I did not fee comfortable with the first verse saying \"\u0938\u092e\u094d\u092a\u094d\u0930\u093e\u092a\u094d\u0924\u0947 \u0938\u0928\u094d\u0928\u093f\u0939\u093f\u0924\u0947 \u0915\u093e\u0932\u0947<br />\n\u0928\u0939\u093f \u0928\u0939\u093f \u0930\u0915\u094d\u0937\u0924\u093f \u0921\u0941\u0915\u0943\u0919\u094d\u0915\u0930\u0923\u0947\". Then again the part where a saffron clad Adi Sankara says<br />\n\u091c\u091f\u093f\u0932\u094b \u092e\u0941\u0923\u094d\u0921\u0940 \u0932\u0941\u091e\u094d\u091b\u093f\u0924\u0915\u0947\u0936\u0903<br />\n\u0915\u093e\u0937\u093e\u092f\u093e\u092e\u094d\u092c\u0930\u092c\u0939\u0941\u0915\u0943\u0924\u0935\u0947\u0937\u0903 \u0964<br />\n\u092a\u0936\u094d\u092f\u0928\u094d\u0928\u092a\u093f \u091a \u0928 \u092a\u0936\u094d\u092f\u0924\u093f \u092e\u0942\u0922\u094b<br />\n\u0939\u094d\u092f\u0941\u0926\u0930\u0928\u093f\u092e\u093f\u0924\u094d\u0924\u0902 \u092c\u0939\u0941\u0915\u0943\u0924\u0935\u0947\u0937\u0903 \u0965 \u0967\u096a\u0965<br />\n<br />\nThere are many who go with matted locks, many who have clean<br />\nshaven heads, many whose hairs have been plucked out; some are<br />\nclothed in orange, yet others in various colours --- all just for<br />\na livelihood.<br />\n<br />\nHow can a saint himself deride saints like this? Even if there are black sheep, will he write a verse deriding all sadhus?<br />\n<br />\nAgain in Hanuman Chalisa - even when reading it aloud, I could not get myself to say these lines -<br />\n<br />\n\u0914\u0930 \u0926\u0947\u0935\u0924\u093e \u091a\u093f\u0924\u094d\u0924 \u0928 \u0927\u0930\u0908 \u0964<br />\n\u0939\u0928\u0941\u092e\u0924 \u0938\u0947\u0907 \u0938\u0930\u094d\u092c \u0938\u0941\u0916 \u0915\u0930\u0908 \u0965\u0969\u096b\u0965<br />\n<br />\nI will not keep any other God in my heart, except Hanuman.<br />\nSo I will not even remember Ram/Vishnu (even though Hanuman himself worships Ram)?<br />\n<br />\nThis never felt right.<br />\n<br />\nAs soon as Ajit ji wrote this, it was a Eureka moment.<br />\n<br />\nMany thanks, Ajit ji.</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_84MN\" kind=\"m\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_84BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/01/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_29.html?showComment=1549009115037#c3161394558144846380\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 1, 2019 at 1:48 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://dharmawiki.org/index.php/Main_Page</span><br /><br />ASHWAMEDHA WAS A \"VOTE OF CONFIDENCE\"...<br /><br />VISHNU TOOK VAMANA AVATAR ( BLUE FACED BRAHMIN MIDGET ) TO KILL KERALA DANAVA KING MAHABALI WHOSE FATHER VIROCHANA RULED THE WHOLE WORLD..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/09/ashwamedha-yagam-bloodless-sacrifice.html</span><br /><br />MAHARISHI SHUKRACHARYA ( POLITICAL ADVISOR OF MAHABALI ) WANTED KING MAHABALI TO DO ASHWAMEDHA YAGNA AND DECLARE HIMSELF KING OF KINGS-- THE EMPEROR ..<br /><br />AND THIS MADE HIS ARCH RIVAL CLASSMATE MAHARISHI BRIHASPATI ( MENTOR OF DEVAS ) VERY JEALOUS .. HE INSTIGATED DEVAS TO IMPLORE VISHNU TO CUT THE STRENGTH OF MAHABALI AND DANAVAS , TO RESTORE DEVA- DANAVA PARITY..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/09/why-kerala-does-not-celebrate-diwali-or.html</span><br /><br />FORGET ABOUT WENDY DONIGER -- EVEN STALWARTS LIKE VIVEKANANDA NEVER DISPUTED THE FOUL LIE THAT ASHWAMEDHA YAGNA WAS A BLOODY HORSE SACRIFICE..<br /><br />CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL WAS THE FIRST ON THE PLANET TO DECLARE THAT ASHWAMEDHA YAGNA WAS JUST A VOTE OF CONFIDENCE.. THERE WAS NO SPILLING OF BLOOD..<br /><br />IN EVERY HINDU YAGAM/ YAGNA THE ONLY SACRIFICE IS DESI GHEE AND COCONUT WATER PLASMA..<br /><br />IN THE IRUMUDI KETTU OF A SABARIMALA PILGRIM THERE ARE TWO COCONUTS--ONE COCONUT WHOSE WATER IS REMOVED AND FILLED WITH DESI HUMPED COW GHEE , AND THE OTHER IS A FULL COCONUT WITH WATER INSIDE..</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">WIKIPEDIA DID BLASPHEMY THAT QUEEN OF AYODHYA KAUSHALYA , LAY BESIDE THE KILLED WHITE HORSE AND USED&nbsp;</span><b><span style=\"color: red;\">THE SEVERED PEN!S OF THE DEAD HORSE AS A D!LDO,</span></b><span style=\"color: purple;\">&nbsp;THE WAY SWARA TRRR BHASKAR ( OR IS IT PRRRR ? ) USED IT.</span></span></div>\n<br />HINDUS ARE THE WORST ENEMIES OF HINDUS .. THERE ARE TOO MANY TRAITORS WHO WILL SELL THIER OWN MOTHERS TO THE WH0REHOUSE FOR HALF A PIECE OF SILVER..<br /><br />NO BLOOD IS ALLOWED IN ANY HINDU TEMPLE.. THE PROPAGANDA OF THE WHITE INVADER, HIS FAKE MUTTS TO MAKE THE HINDU SELF LOATHING , LITERARY FEST DROHIS , BENAMI MEDIA , ATHEIST COMMIES ETC IS A BIG LIE..<br /><br />THIS IS WHY MENSTRUATING WOMEN ARE NOT ALLOWED IN THE TANTRIC SABARIMALA SANCTUM..<br /><br />ONE DROP OF BLOOD CANNOT FALL IN THE TEMPLE INNER SANCTUM..<br /><br />IF THE CHIEF TANTRI HAS A CUT ON HIS BODY AND ONE DROP OF HIS BLOOD SHOWS - IT DOES NOT HAVE TO FALL ON THE GROUND.. THE SAME PURIFICATION RITUAL IS UNDERTAKEN..<br /><br />IT DOES NOT MATTER IF THE BLOOD BELONGS TO MAN OR WOMAN..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/11/all-animal-sacrifices-in-hindu-temples.html<br /><br />https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/11/5900-year-old-sabarimala-this-planets.html</span><br /><br /><b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY IS RESPONSIBLE FOR ALLOWING DENIGRATION OF SANATANA DHARMA..&nbsp; &nbsp; PEOPLE LIKE PARSI PRIEST CUM JUDGE ROHINGTON NARIMAN BE WARNED --WE THE PEOPLE PUT YOU ON NOTICE..</span></b><br /><br />capt ajit vadakayil<br />..<br /><span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"c3161394558144846380-ce\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c179396532009620330\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. font-size: large;\">Sanatana Dharma allows only SHRADDHA ( enlightened faith ) \u2013never BHAKTI ( blind faith out of dogma ) \u2013self verification is paramount for Hindus..&nbsp;</span><br />\nShraddha is not something that we can command; it has to happen..<br />\n<br />\nIn having Shraddha, there is trust, faith, reverence, devotion, openness, and freedom. In fact, this is the trust where there is freedom.<br />\n<br />\nShraddha is a Sanskrit/ Malayalam word -- an unshakable conviction in our journey.<br />\n<br />\nNo spiritual progress is possible without shraddha.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN THE FOLLOWING WEBSITES--<br />\nSHATRUGHAN SINHA<br />\nYASHWANT SINHA<br />\nARUN SHOURIE<br />\nLK ADVANI<br />\nJASWANT SINGH<br />\nMURLI MANOHAR JOSHI<br />\n<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nCJI<br />\nLAW MINISTER<br />\nSMRITI IRANI<br />\nPMO<br />\nI&amp;B MINISTRY<br />\nRSS<br />\nVHP<br />\nAVBP<br />\nCMs OF ALL STATES ( LEAVE OUT MOMOTO AND KACHRAWAAL )<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />\nCBSE CHIEF<br />\nNITI AYOG<br />\nAMITABHA KANT<br />\nMANEKA GANDHI<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL<br />\nSUPREME COURT BAR COUNCIL<br />\nEDUCATION MINISTER<br />\nNIRMALA SITARAMAN<br />\nSUSHMA SWARAJ<br />\n<br />\nWEBSITES OF ALL DESH BHAKT LEADERS<br />\nSPREAD ON SOCIAL MEDIA-- EVERY WHICH WAY.<br />\n<br />\nI ASK MY READERS TO CO-OPERATE. IT IS ABOUT HYGEINE<br />\n<br />\nMANY TIMES PEOPLE HAVE ASKED ME-- WHY DO HINDU MALE DEVOTEES GO BARE CHEST IN KERALA TEMPLE-- SAY GURUVAYUR.<br />\n<br />\nIN HINDU TEMPLES BLOOD OUTSIDE THE SKIN IS CONSIDERED IMPURE --IN THIS AIDS ERA WE KNOW WHY.. THIS APPLIES TO HUMANS AND ANIMALS..<br />\n<br />\nIF A COW OR AN ELEPHANT BLEEDS IT IS TAKEN OUT OF THE TEMPLE. IF A PUJARI BLEEDS HE HAS TO STOP IMMEDIATELY --ND THEN THERE IS A RITUAL TO PURIFY.. THIS CAN HAPPEN EVEN IF A SMALL BABY PISSES ON THE TEMPLE FLOOR..<br />\n<br />\nA DROP OF BLOOD OUTSIDE THE BODYs LEATHER BAG ( SKIN COVER ) IS CONSIDERED IMPURE..<br />\n<br />\nYET--AFTER THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA, HE CREATED MORE THAN A THOUSAND FAKE MUTTS..AND THEY INTRODUCED BLOOD SACRIFICE INSIDE TEMPLES..
